title: Caretaker Droid in the Sundrenched Studio
prompt: (masterpiece), best quality, ultra detailed, Modern Anime style, a sleek white humanoid robot (android, caretaker droid) standing in a spacious, sunlit artist studio loft, gently watering lush green houseplants with a silver watering can. The studio features concrete walls, minimalist furniture, and several abstract expressionist paintings hanging on the wall. A massive floor-to-ceiling window shows a dramatic city skyline during golden hour (sunset/sunrise) with soft orange and pink clouds. Detailed volumetric lighting, visible dust motes in the light rays, soft shadows, peaceful atmosphere, 16:9 aspect ratio.
